trans-unit.source: Defines the metadata attribute that ASP.NET server controls use to specify whether they participate in loading view-state information by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>.
trans-unit.target: 定義中繼資料屬性的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用來指定是否參與<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>載入檢視狀態資訊

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class is used to specify a control that requires view-state loading by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 類別用來指定需要檢視狀態載入控制項

trans-unit.source: The default view-state loading behavior is for ASP.NET to load the view-state information for a control by its index in the control tree of the page.
trans-unit.target: 預設的檢視狀態載入行為是依其索引頁面的控制項樹狀目錄中載入控制項的檢視狀態資訊的 asp.net。

trans-unit.source: There is a performance cost for loading view-state information by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> because the page control tree must be searched for the control specifically before loading its view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 載入檢視狀態資訊的效能成本<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>網頁的控制項樹狀結構必須要搜尋控制項載入其檢視狀態資訊之前，特別是因為。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class is used as a metadata attribute of a custom control class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A> property of the control returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 類別做為自訂控制項類別的中繼資料屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>控制項的屬性會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class is not used, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A> property of the control returns its default value of `false`, which means that the control does not load its view-state information by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 類別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>控制項的屬性傳回的預設值`false`，這表示控制項不會載入其檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class does not apply to saving the view-state information for a control.
trans-unit.target: ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 類別不適用於儲存控制項的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The ViewStateModeByIdAttribute class metadata attribute is valid only on class declarations.
trans-unit.target: 只有在類別宣告上有效 ViewStateModeByIdAttribute 類別中繼資料屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute> to a control class means that the control will have its view-state information loaded by <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute>至控制項類別表示控制項會有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>載入其檢視狀態資訊</xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute>
